QuestData.Title: Bones and Arrows
QuestData.Description: Dragons are incredible! Well, their bones at least! I've been equipping our archers with arrowheads made of Dragonbone. Unfortunately, since the massacre at Angrathar, it has become almost impossible to get bone from Dragonblight.$B$BHowever, the Forest of Shadows on the western edge of Wintergrasp has enough bones to tide us over.$B$BHead to the Forest of Shadows and bring back any bone splinters you can find!$B$BThe Horde have been seen collecting bone splinters in the area. Slay them!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bowyer Randolph in Wintergrasp wants you to retrieve 10 Quivers of Dragonbone Arrows from Horde players at the Forest of Shadows.
QuestData.CompletionText: How was the hunting? I've heard rumors the place is haunted, though I never venture out there myself.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent! This will help fuel the flames of war for days to come.
